com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class SchedulerRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.SchedulerRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class SchedulerRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Sets up and executes the AbstractScheduler instance.

    • Method Detail

      • fromRawServiceSpec

        public static SchedulerRunner fromRawServiceSpec(RawServiceSpec rawServiceSpec,
                                                 SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig,
                                                 java.io.File configTemplateDir)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Builds a new instance using a RawServiceSpec representing the raw object model of a YAML service specification file.
        Parameters:
        rawServiceSpec - the object model of a YAML service specification file
        schedulerConfig - the scheduler configuration to use (usually based on process environment)
        configTemplateDir - the directory where any configuration templates are located (usually the parent directory of the YAML service specification file)
        Returns:
        a new SchedulerRunner instance, which may be launched with run()
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • fromServiceSpec

        public static SchedulerRunner fromServiceSpec(ServiceSpec serviceSpec,
                                              SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig)
                                       throws PersisterException
        Builds a new instance using a ServiceSpec representing the serializable Java representation of a service specification.
        Parameters:
        serviceSpec - the service specification converted to be used by the config store
        schedulerConfig - the scheduler configuration to use (usually based on process environment)
        Returns:
        a new SchedulerRunner instance, which may be launched with run()
        Throws:
        PersisterException

      • fromSchedulerBuilder

        public static SchedulerRunner fromSchedulerBuilder(SchedulerBuilder schedulerBuilder)
        Builds a new instance using a SchedulerBuilder instance representing the scheduler logic to be executed.
        Parameters:
        schedulerBuilder - the (likely customized) scheduler object to be run by the runner
        Returns:
        a new SchedulerRunner instance, which may be launched with run()

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the scheduler. Don't forget to call this! This should never exit, instead the entire process will be terminated internally.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
